column4: I think I need a driver but I have never used linux, kinda lost
Asus G50v, no wireless, no network.
according to a few sites, everything should work out of the box...
there is a switch on the front of your laptop, is it on?
in a terminal type sudo echo 1 > /sys/devices/platform/asus-laptop/wlan
have you run echo 1 | sudo tee /sys/devices/platform/asus-laptop/wlan ?
I don't think I have run that command
you need results of iwconfig pasted?
did you see that last paste was iwconfig?
yea just saw it. everything looks good on the hardware detection/driver side
